name: School's Out (L0stWoods)
description:
School's Out is a short, slow-paced point-and-click adventure game where you play as a teacher who is cleaning out their room at the end of their first year teaching. As they rummage through desks, dust off the class projector, and sort out the clutter of the cubbies, they encounter the lives of their students through the objects that were left behind.

Designed by:

Des Cardero

Emily Cheng

Counti S.M.

Thomas Nielsen
